summary.span: 表示一个标记，该标记包含与规则匹配时运行的 ECMAScript 。

span.span: Represents a tag that contains ECMAScript that's run when the rule is matched.
Creates an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个语义转译标记，其 属性包含空字符串。This constructor creates a semantic interpretation tag whose property contains an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个语义转译标记，其 属性设置为中的值 `script` 。This constructor creates a semantic interpretation tag whose property is set to the value in `script`.
